DOC.brief_title: Maintenance rTMS Treatment-resistant Depression ( TRD ) : One-year Double Blind Controlled Study
DOC.detailed_description: The study involve 40 TRD patient single site trial consist two phase : acute phase ( phase I ) participant receive active high-frequency stimulation 4 block five consecutive working day ( Monday Friday ) open-label design maintenance phase ( phase II ) responder ( > 49 % HDRS-17 reduction baseline ) end phase I randomize two arm sham active high-frequency rTMS maintenance treatment eleven follow month . The rhythm rTMS session maintenance phase gradually reduce follow : 3 session per week 2 week , 2 session per week 2 following week , 1 session per week third ( M3 ) fourth month ( M4 ) 1 session every fortnight last eight month ( M5 M12 ) .
